original_text: With employment of utilizing the investigation, expert interviews and comparison, this article investigates the curricula construction, curricula design and curricula content for sports free normal students. On the basis of the investigation, this article analyzed the theoretical framework of curricular construction and proposed some suggestions. We hope that it can provide some evidences for curricula design for sports free normal students.
